message:
Our Training program for mid year vacation :

C++Programming (100LE ).
Data Structure (125LE).

Place: Faculty Of Computer and Information, Cairo University .

Course Duration : 20H
From 2nd to 6th of February

Time :
Two groups in each Course
Morning: From 9:00 am to 1:00 pm.
Evening: From 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm.

story: Heba PiTechologies shared PiTech Esd's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Mid Year Vacation Training
caption: Mid Year Vacation Training
description:
PiTechnologies is glad to announce the first partnership in Cairo University, Faculty of Computer and information with "Technoship" student activity.

As we trying to deal with the negative attitudes towards technical training which considers one of the key reasons behind the persistently high level of unemployment in Egypt that increased to 13.4% in the third quarter of 2013.


Our Training program for mid year vacation :

    C++Programming (100LE ).
    Data Structure (125LE).

Place: Faculty Of Computer and Information, Cairo University .

Course Duration : 20H
                          From 2nd to 6th of February

Time :
Two groups in each Course
Morning: From 9:00 am to 1:00 pm.
Evening: From 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm.

**        **        **
